name: place must exist before departure (demo)
description:
This demo version has the same abilities but on a limited and smaller map. To experience the full version please contact the author.

place must exist before departure is an Interactive Fiction that combines chronicles, historical reports, archive material, maps, speculation, oral storytelling, and personal experiences. It is an invitation to explore the subterranean spaces under the streets of Paraná, Entre Ríos, AR.

Uncover what lies hidden in the subterranean architecture. 

Connect the surface with the deepest layers of history. 

Every turn at a corner changes the story.

Is reality a condition for the existence of a place? 

Is fiction a limitation to existence? 

What is a place? 

Exist in fictional places.
